meta.title: For Reeja, my mutu.
meta.coverLine: A small place where our memories live.
meta.tagline: This is not a website. This is us.

letter.heading: To my mutu
letter.body:
Reeja...

You know what I love about us?
How we did not rush.
How we kept becoming more us, one small moment at a time.

You are a nurse, so you spend your days taking care of people.
But I want you to remember this:
Someone is always taking care of you too.
Me. Always.

From the first day we added each other... to the first time we met alone...
to the nights we fell asleep on call...
to the days you showed me the most real version of you...

I do not just love the big moments.
I love the quiet ones.
The kitchen call. The bathroom call. The random parking-lot destiny.
The way we made distance feel useless.

So today, I made you something small.
Not expensive. Not loud.
Just beautiful and true.

When you are ready...
Let us walk through our story again, mutu.

reasons: You make simple days feel safe.
You are brave in every life chapter.
You love quietly, and it stays forever.
You are my favorite person in every mood.
You made my heart creative again.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Beginning
chapters.reflection: One tiny tap became one huge beginning.

memories.title: The first moment
memories.caption: We added each other and something started.
memories.expandedCaption: 9:19 PM. One small tap, one big beginning. I did not know it then, but my life had already changed.

memories.title: First time I saw you
memories.caption: The first real oh... it is you.
memories.expandedCaption: Some people look normal in real life. You looked like the start of a story.

memories.title: Just us, Godawari
memories.caption: Our first real moment alone.
memories.expandedCaption: Godawari. Around 1 PM. No crowd, no noise, just two hearts learning each other.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Growing Feelings
chapters.reflection: Maybe became real, and real became us.

memories.title: First song
memories.caption: I wrote for my mutu.
memories.expandedCaption: That is when I knew: I do not just like you. I want to create things for you.

memories.title: Destiny parking lot
memories.caption: We met again by accident.
memories.expandedCaption: Out of all places, the universe really said: no, you two are not done yet.

memories.title: First date
memories.caption: Officially, us.
memories.expandedCaption: I still remember the feeling: nervous, happy, and oddly safe at the same time.

memories.title: Family dinner
memories.caption: My heart was full.
memories.expandedCaption: You sat with my family like you belonged there. Honestly, you did.

memories.title: Personal became personal-er
memories.caption: You told me your birth year.
memories.expandedCaption: It sounds small, but it was trust. It was you letting me closer.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Love Language
chapters.reflection: Words became feelings, and feelings became home.

memories.title: A poem
memories.caption: Because I could not keep it inside.
memories.expandedCaption: Some feelings do not fit in normal sentences. So I borrowed poetry.

memories.title: First I love you (voice)
memories.caption: The day my heart learned a new sound.
memories.expandedCaption: Hearing it in your voice hit different. Soft. Real. Permanent.

memories.title: Your love letter
memories.caption: I reread it in my head.
memories.expandedCaption: You wrote love like you meant it. Like you were building a home with words.

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Our Rituals
chapters.reflection: Distance stopped mattering because presence stayed.

memories.title: First video call
memories.caption: Distance lost a little that day.
memories.expandedCaption: Seeing you live, talking like it is normal. That is when us started feeling real daily.

memories.title: First tika (video call)
memories.caption: A blessing across distance.
memories.expandedCaption: Even through a screen, you found a way to put tika on me. That is love with intention.

memories.title: The famous threatening moment
memories.caption: Only we know.
memories.expandedCaption: This stays coded forever. If someone asks, we smile and change topic.
memories.secret: Inside joke unlocked: threatening mode activated, cute edition.

memories.title: First sleep on call
memories.caption: We fell asleep together.
memories.expandedCaption: No talking. No trying. Just presence. That kind of comfort is rare, Reeja.

chapters.title: Chapter 5: Her Era
chapters.reflection: You trusted me with your real life, and I loved every version.

memories.title: That selfie
memories.caption: One of the most beautiful things I have seen.
memories.expandedCaption: Not just your face. The feeling behind it. Like you trusted me with your softness.

memories.title: Childhood photo unlock
memories.caption: Pure side revealed.
memories.expandedCaption: That was you saying: here, this is my real history. And I loved you more.

memories.title: First gift
memories.caption: You gave me something, and I kept it in my heart.
memories.expandedCaption: The gift was sweet, but the message was sweeter: I thought of you.

memories.title: Makeup photo (saved forever)
memories.caption: I saved it. Obviously.
memories.expandedCaption: Because some moments are too pretty to risk forgetting.

memories.title: The yellow dress
memories.caption: Still in my mind.
memories.expandedCaption: That yellow dress moment is burned into my memory like a favorite song chorus.

memories.title: First kiss voice note (wana)
memories.caption: A kiss in sound.
memories.expandedCaption: It was cute, bold, and so you. I replayed it like a secret.

memories.title: First kiss video + hand gesture
memories.caption: I watched it too many times.
memories.expandedCaption: 10:29 PM. That little gesture felt like you pulled me closer through the screen.

memories.title: First virtual chess match
memories.caption: I won. Proof: I wrote it here.
memories.expandedCaption: You can rematch anytime. But history is history.

memories.title: No-filter snap
memories.caption: Real face. Real you.
memories.expandedCaption: That is intimacy. Not the perfect version, the honest one. And I loved it.

memories.title: Sari on video (first time)
memories.caption: I was speechless.
memories.expandedCaption: You looked like tradition and beauty decided to collaborate.

memories.title: Kitchen call and bathroom call
memories.caption: No distance. No shyness.
memories.expandedCaption: You called me from real life, not prepared life. That is when love becomes daily.

memories.title: New chapter
memories.caption: You resigned from the Teaching Hospital.
memories.expandedCaption: I was proud. Change is scary, but you are braver than you think. I am with you in every version of life.

memories.title: 6 hours 58 minutes
memories.caption: Whole night. Whole heart.
memories.expandedCaption: Talking until sleep. That is not time passing, that is love building.

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Here And Now
chapters.reflection: Still unfolding, still choosing each other.

memories.title: Flower on Bhaisipati colony road
memories.caption: You gave me a flower.
memories.expandedCaption: Simple moment. Big meaning. I felt chosen.

memories.title: First skirt moment
memories.caption: A new kind of shy.
memories.expandedCaption: You looked confident and cute at the same time. I remember everything.

memories.title: Kantara
memories.caption: Your first after-us movie.
memories.expandedCaption: You watched Kantara with Teaching Hospital friends, and somehow even that detail feels special to me.

One date planned fully by me.
One comfort meal plus calm movie night.
One I will do the boring task for you card.

finale.heading: Happy Valentine's Day, Reeja.
finale.holdPrompt: Press and hold for 1.5 seconds to reveal your final line.
finale.revealedLine: Mutu... thank you for choosing me in small ways, again and again. I do not want perfect love. I want safe love. With you, it already is.
